title: GitHub is no longer independent at Microsoft after CEO resignation
author: Handy-Man
aiHeadline: GitHub's independence at Microsoft is now as independent as a paperclip in a Staples store—fully Microsoft now, after CEO's dramatic exit.

title: I tried every todo app and ended up with a .txt file
author: al3rez
aiHeadline: After an exhaustive search for the perfect todo app, turns out a simple .txt file was the only productivity hack you needed—because why overcomplicate things?

title: Wikimedia Foundation Challenges UK Online Safety Act Regulations
author: danso
aiHeadline: Wikimedia Foundation takes a stand against UK's Online Safety Act, proving that even non-profits can be rebels without a cause.

title: Wikipedia loses challenge against Online Safety Act
author: phlummox
aiHeadline: Wikipedia's fight against the Online Safety Act ends in defeat, proving that sometimes even the best ideas get regulated into oblivion.

title: Claude Code is all you need
author: sixhobbits
aiHeadline: Claude Code is all you need—because why bother with anything else when one tool can do it all, right?
